snippet.title: Path of Exile: Necropolis Official Trailer
snippet.description:
In Path of Exile: Necropolis, help Undertaker Arimor lay the spirits of the Eternal Empire to rest and experiment with their souls to create powerful items.

Our March expansion introduces the Necropolis Challenge League, a plethora of changes to the endgame, new tier 17 Maps and Bosses and new Transfigured Gems.

Find out more at https://www.pathofexile.com/necropolis
